price: Jedhiin: "sila gara (shirkii irraa) qulqulleffachuutti fedha qabdaa?
arabic: فَقُلۡ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: faqul hal laka ilā an tazakkā
